items.title: CLSA, HSBC raise target price on Dixon Technologies following HP India deal, see 12% upside
items.description: Dixon Technologies sees near-term growth stemming from new customer acquisition and increased mobile phone market share.

items.title: Lemon Tree Hotels inks agreement for upcoming hotel in Mumbai's Mira Road, stock in focus
items.description: Lemon Tree Hotels stock in focus after announcing a new license agreement for its upcoming Mira Road, Mumbai property, expected to open in FY26.

items.title: CLSA reiterates 'outperform' call on Shriram Finance amid stable asset quality, margins
items.description: The global brokerage firm has set Shriram Finance's target price at Rs 3,350 apiece

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates| Gift Nifty indicates a flat start; US markets mixed, Asia falls
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's benchmark S&P 500 index closed up 0.5% on Tuesday but concerns about slowing economic growth stunted gains and the Dow dipped as bank stocks sank after warnings of current-quarter weakness while energy shares tumbled. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 92.63 points, or 0.23%, to 40,736.96, the S&P 500 gained 24.47 points, or 0.45%, to 5,495.52 and the Nasdaq Composite gained 141.28 points, or 0.84%, to 17,025.88.

items.title: IREDA stock in focus after subsidiary earns provisional registration as finance firm in GIFT City
items.description: IREDA shares are in focus after the state-owned firm's subsidiary received provisional registration as a finance company from IFSCA at GIFT City.

items.title: Trading Plan: Will Nifty and Bank Nifty continue its uptrend in today's session?
items.description: Nifty is facing immediate resistance at 25,130, with further hurdles at 25,350.

items.title: Trade Setup for Today: 15 things to know before the Opening Bell
items.description: The short-term trend for Nifty appears to have reversed upwards, and the index is now positioned near the critical resistance level of 25,200.

items.title: UBS Securities gives 'sell' call on Tata Motors, sees 20% downside potential
items.description: Tata Motors recently launched its 'Festival of cars' campaign, significantly slashing prices for its electric vehicle as well as traditional vehicles for a limited period.

items.title: Northern ARC Capital sets IPO price band at Rs 249-263, issue valued at Rs 777 crore
items.description: The IPO includes a fresh issue worth Rs 500 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) of up to 1.05 crore shares by existing shareholders and promoters, valued at Rs 277 crore at the upper price band.

items.title: CEAT shares gain as India Ratings & Research upgrades outlook to 'positive' from 'stable'
items.description: So far this year, shares of CEAT surged over 17 percent, slightly above benchmark Nifty 50's 15 percent upmove

items.title: Live: Nifty faces resistance at 25,100; Will the rebound sustain? Brent Crude below $70|Opening Bell
items.description:
Indian equity benchmarks opened higher yesterday and, after initial volatility, demonstrated strong buying interest, with the Nifty closing on a positive note at 25,041.

Both the Sensex and Nifty rose for the second session this week on September 10, driven by gains in IT, telecom, power, and healthcare sectors. This morning the GIFT Nifty is indicating a negative start amind mixed global cues. Asia-Pacific markets slip as U.S. presidential debate between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris unravels. Also watch out for OMCs and paint companies as Crude drops below the $70 mark. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Rajesh Palviya, Senior Vice President Research (Head Technical & Derivatives) at Axis Securities and Gaurav Dua, SVP, Head - Capital Market Strategy at Sharekhan.

items.title: Gensol Engineering to set up IndiaŌĆÖs first Green Hydrogen Valley project
items.description: The project will set up green hydrogen plant on Build Own and Operate (BOO) basis, supplying to specialty chemical sector for 20 years.

items.title: Analyst Call Tracker August 2024: Shriram Finance hits hattrick as top pick on Street, HDFC Life makes strong debut
items.description: Based on Moneycontrol's tracker, 39 out of 40 brokerages have given a 'buy' rating for Shriram Finance, with only 1 maintaining a 'sell' recommendation for the NBFC

items.title: Suzlon Energy shares hit 5% upper circuit again; multibagger stock up 241% in a year
items.description: Suzlon Energy shares hit the 5 percent upper circuit on September 11, buoyed by Morgan Stanley's reaffirmation of its ŌĆśoverweightŌĆÖ rating and a landmark wind energy order from NTPC Green Energy.

items.title: Upstream oil majors drop as much as 5% after Brent crude slips below $70
items.description: Brent crude prices dipped below $70 per barrel overnight for the first time since December 2021, as worries about sluggish demand, slowing economic growth, and the increasing shift towards electric vehicles weighed on the sentiment.

items.title: Ramco Systems stock surges 6% to 52-week high following Aviation Software 6.0 launch
items.description: Ramco Systems shares surged to a 52-week high following the launch of its advanced Aviation Software 6.0, which introduces innovative features aimed at transforming MRO and M&E processes.
